title: MOMOFUKU MILK BAR
seo_description: Leave it to Momofuku Milk bar founder and chef Christina Tosi to create a dessert sensation out of something so simple. Exactly as the name reads, this soft serve tastes like that wonderful last sip of milk after downing a sugary bowl of cereal. No trip to NYC is complete without a taste.
contents:
cereal milk soft serve
15 W 56th St
walk: 7 minutes 

Leave it to Momofuku Milk bar founder and chef Christina Tosi to create a dessert sensation out of something so simple. Exactly as the name reads, this soft serve tastes like that wonderful last sip of milk after downing a sugary bowl of cereal. No trip to NYC is complete without a taste.
